p: We ran full-time varying models for survival (Φ t) and recruitment (f t) to provide annual estimates of these parameters, for each site. We plotted annual estimates and predicted annual values from the best supported covariate model (S3). We subsequently derived inter-annual values of population growth λ t, as λ t = Φ t + f t for each and plotted annual estimates to illustrate the trajectory for each population (S7).
